sentences.en: Don't betray the people's trust in you.
sentences.cn: 不要辜负人民对你的信任.

sentences.en: He felt that she had betrayed him.
sentences.cn: 他感觉她背叛了自己。

sentences.en: He nodded his head instead of saying anything where his voice might betray him.
sentences.cn: 他一言不发，只是点头，因为一开口可能会露出破绽。

sentences.en: He promised never to betray the organization.
sentences.cn: 他发誓永不背叛组织.

sentences.en: His face betrayed nothing (=  showed no emotion  ) .
sentences.cn: 他不露声色。

sentences.en: His voice betrayed his nervousness.
sentences.cn: 他的声音暴露了他的紧张。

sentences.en: I conjure you not to betray me.
sentences.cn: 我恳求你不要背弃我.

sentences.en: I would as lief kill myself as betray my master.
sentences.cn: 我宁愿自杀也不会出卖我的主人。

sentences.en: I would never betray a confidence (=  tell a secret that someone has trusted me with  ) .
sentences.cn: 我永远不会泄露秘密。

sentences.en: Keep calm. Don't betray your identity.
sentences.cn: 沉住气, 别可露馅儿.

sentences.en: No, Luca would never betray us.
sentences.cn: 不会, 路加绝不会背叛我们.

sentences.en: Only occasionally did the telltale redness around his eyes betray the fatigue he was suffering.
sentences.cn: 只有从他发红的眼圈上偶尔能看出他非常疲惫。

sentences.en: Rosamond was not one of those helpless girls who betray themselves unawares.
sentences.cn: 罗莎蒙德不是那种软弱无能的女孩子、会在不知不觉中暴露自己.

sentences.en: She had betrayed her parents' trust .
sentences.cn: 她辜负了父母对她的信任。

sentences.en: She pursed her lips together, as though fearing to betray her news.
sentences.cn: 她闭紧双唇，仿佛害怕透露出她的消息。

sentences.en: They offered me money if I would betray my associates.
sentences.cn: 他们提出来只要我供出同伙就给我钱。

sentences.en: To betray a friend is a base action.
sentences.cn: 出卖朋友是卑鄙的行为.

sentences.en: Trust thyself only, and another shall not betray thee.
sentences.cn: 只有信任你自己, 别人才不会出卖你.

sentences.en: When I tell someone I will not betray his confidence I keep my word.
sentences.cn: 如果我告诉某人我不会辜负他的信任，我就会恪守诺言。

sentences.en: Woe betide you if you betray us.
sentences.cn: 如果你背叛我们,你会得到报应.

trans.tran_en: to be disloyal to someone who trusts you, so that they are harmed or upset
